column1: Alcohol breaks down much more slowly in the baby's body than in an adult.
DANGERS OF ALCOHOL DURING PREGNANCY Drinking a lot of alcohol during pregnancy can lead to a group of defects in the baby known as fetal alcohol syndrome.
Complications seen in the infant may include: - Cerebral palsy - Premature delivery - Miscarriage or stillbirth HOW MUCH ALCOHOL IS SAFE?
- Drinking moderate amounts of alcohol when pregnant may lead to miscarriage.
If you cannot control your drinking, avoid being around other people who are using alcohol.
